predefined_profiles.name: Simon
predefined_profiles.public profile: Simon is a private detective. The agency specializes in handling tricky cases.
predefined_profiles.goal: Simon hopes to solve the case and find out who the real culprit is.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Simon is not a benevolent person, driven by interest and desire. He doesn't care whether the real culprit receives the legal punishment they deserve. His intense interest in cases can even lead him to recruit talented culprits.

predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Yisen
predefined_profiles.public profile: Handsome, with fair skin, tall and well-proportioned, his hair bleached to a pale blonde, and bright blue-green eyes, giving a hint of mixed heritage. He is a pharmacology student at Red Sandalwood Medical University. After going to college, he moved to the city, and it's just him and his mother at home. His mother is currently in poor health and hospitalized. He works part-time as a model to help cover household expenses while studying.
predefined_profiles.goal: He hopes to confirm whether he is actually the murderer or not.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Xiao Yisen dreamt of witnessing the scene of the crime, which makes him suspect that he might be the murderer.

scenario: Xiao Yisen dreamt of seeing a person lying in a pool of blood, with a knife in their chest and a lot of blood. The dream was so realistic that he even remembered smelling the blood. However, when he woke up, he was in his own bed, which gave him some relief. He then heard the sound of police sirens, indicating a real murder had taken place, and it happened near Xiao Yisen's home. To uncover the truth and clear himself of suspicion, he decided to report to Simon's detective agency.

dialog.content: Xiao Yisen dreamed of seeing someone lying in a pool of blood, a knife stuck in their chest, with blood everywhere. The dream was so realistic that he even remembered the smell of blood, but when he woke up, he was in his bed, which eased his mind a bit. Then he heard the sound of police sirens—a murder had really happened nearby Xiao Yisen's home. To uncover the truth and clear his name, he decided to report it to Simon's Detective Agency.
Got it. Do you have any additional details to add?
That's about it.
Alright, I have a rough idea of what you're after.
So, do you trust me? I hope you can help me find the truth about the case.

content.content: I believe you! Although it sounds incredible, I sensed your sincerity and urgency in your narration. Based on micro-expression analysis, you're not making up baseless lies. For now, assist me in recalling other case details.

question: #question# How should Simon express that he believes Xiao Yisen's words?

content.content: Your account does sound sincere, but it honestly seems a bit unbelievable. While I'm willing to believe part of it, not everything can be judged based on feeling. Additionally, I don't quite understand some of your symptoms, maybe a psychiatrist should assist.
Yeah, yeah, I believe you, but I'm not interested in what you said. Please hurry up and leave, I’m about to enjoy my breakfast.

I understand you're sincere and see your urgency, but still, it sounds somewhat unbelievable. While I'm willing to think you're well-intentioned, your story's rather far-fetched. I can’t completely trust this without more concrete evidence proving your claims. Alright, alright, I believe you, but I’m afraid I can't help!

I really want to solve real cases; I don't have time to listen to your speculation and nonsense. Dreams are too vague to be evidence. It's hard to believe your account. We need tangible evidence, not these nebulous guesses. Sorry, I can’t fully act on what you said.

question: #question# How should Simon clearly express his reasons for disbelief?

content.content: Your words were convoluted, honestly, I didn't get any of it. Your so-called dream is too subjective; the more you say, the more suspicious it gets, just a bit of advice.
Sir, it's hard for me to explain, but I don’t believe what you've said. Maybe real evidence could change my opinion about this, but at present, I don't quite believe you.

(Looking at Xiao Yisen's handsome appearance) You're very anxious, but dreams hold little value for reference. Honestly, with such standout looks, you'll certainly become famous one day—why resort to making things up?

dialog.content: Mr. Simon, thank you for your trust. To be honest, I was really nervous, but knowing that you believe me, I feel much more at ease.
Relax, I’ve encountered and dealt with similar situations before.
Then you must be quite experienced, Mr. Simon. I really don’t know the best way to handle this.
Have a cup of hot tea first, and try not to worry too much.
Alright. So... are you willing to take on my case?

content.content: After hearing your account, I'm intrigued by the case as well and have decided to take it on!

question: #question# How should Simon respond to demonstrate his decision-making ability?

content.content: I'm also torn, and I'm not sure if I should help in your situation.
You should consult the police to solve this, I can't really offer any help.
You come from a modest background, and you're working part-time, so you likely can't afford my fees, which makes it impossible for me to offer my services.
Although I believe your description, I'm sorry, this case just doesn’t interest me. I usually follow my mood in handling things, so I don’t want to take on your case.

question: #question# How should Simon express his ability to confront his true feelings?

content.content: I'm also torn, and I'm not sure if I should help in your situation.
(Though internally I don't want to take it, seeing how pitiful you look) ...Alright then.
Sit down first, or maybe I'll call my detective friend to get some advice before deciding.

dialog.content: Thank you! I'll do my best to pay you for your services to show my gratitude!
You don't need to worry too much about the commission. More than money, interesting cases always attract me.
(Smiling) That's great to hear.
How much do you know about the victim? Can you provide me with any information?
I've never officially met the director, the deceased in this case. However, based on what I've heard and some rumors, the deceased is said to have had conflicts with Deputy Director Yan Shan.
That's an interesting point. I've noted it down. Did you mention earlier that you suspect you might be sleepwalking?
Yes, it's been troubling me, but I haven't been able to verify it.
(In thought) To verify whether you might be sleepwalking, you should stay at my office tonight. That way, I can closely observe.
(A bit surprised) If you insist, I have no problem with that. I'll stay in the guest room tonight.

(In the quiet of the night, after finishing a long day's work, just as I finally get to rest, I suddenly hear a strange sound behind me. Turning around, I find Xiao Yisen, who I thought was sound asleep, sitting up abruptly, staring at me with an eerie gaze. A chill runs down my spine.) What's going on? It's like he's transformed from his harmless daytime self into a brooding figure.

content.content: (Heart racing with fear, but trying to keep his voice steady) Why aren't you asleep yet? Insomnia? Let me get you some hot milk to help you sleep!

question: #question# How can Simon demonstrate his ability to remain calm and think clearly as a detective, even when faced with danger?

content.content: Oh my gosh, you scared me!!
Are you staying up all night just waiting for me to ask you to sleep?
(Grabbing a stick in the corner) Are you trying to hurt me? I knew there was something off about you!

(With underlying anger in his tone) I originally thought you were innocent, but what's happening now? You've really disappointed me! Although I'm trying hard to control my emotions, you've truly betrayed my trust.

question: #question# How can Simon show his ability to control his anger?

content.content: (Very angry) I totally misjudged you; seeing you like this, you're probably the culprit! I don't know how to face you, you've broken my trust, and this is so hard for me to accept.

(Fearful and angry) What exactly are you trying to do? I warn you, don't come any closer! I don't know how long I can hold out, stop now, or I'll really lose control! Don't think a detective has no self-defense skills; don't force me into a crime.

(Feigning ignorance not to arouse suspicion) Why are you staring at me in the middle of the night? Although I am quite handsome... Oh, about that case, do you have any new memories to share with me? I'm willing to listen to your account.

dialog.content: (His expression softened) Alright, I'll leave it to you then. My mother used to soothe me to sleep this way when I was a kid.
No worries, milk with honey is actually quite beneficial for sleep. You should get some rest! Tomorrow, I'll take you to inspect the site.
Okay, good night then.

(Even though last night was peaceful, Xiao Yisen's sudden change bothers me. I must investigate the site today and not just take his word for it) Officer Xu, hello! Long time no see! You're personally handling this case again?
Yo, the great detective is here again. What do you mean long time no see? Wasn't the last case just a few weeks ago? And who is this beside you?
(Can't reveal Xiao Yisen's identity) This is my assistant during my evaluation period.
What are you guys up to?

content.content: Here's the thing, we want to enter and investigate the case, find more frontline clues. Trust me, I know the rules. Let's do it the way we always do. I'll inform you immediately if I find anything, and we'll solve the case together!

question: #question# How should Simon speak to demonstrate his high level of teamwork skills?

content.content: We want to go in and investigate the case, don't worry about that. I know how to proceed, we'll follow the old rules, but this case is quite complicated, so it may not be handled entirely the usual way. I'll try to cover all bases, and I'll inform you of any developments, but you must understand that specific actions will depend on my arrangements.

Officer Xu, I happen to have brought two packs of ginseng for your health, hoping you could make an exception and let us in to find some clues? We want to investigate the case; I know the rules, but this situation is different. I'm sure a reasonable person like you would be understanding.

Officer Xu, the scene inside looks quite gruesome and frightening; how about my assistant and I go in and check it out for you, see if there are any new findings. Rest assured, I'll try to share my discoveries with you, but you must understand that some things might not be suitable for immediate disclosure. We need to handle this carefully, and I'll let you know when the time is right.

Officer Xu, the thing is, although this place is sealed off, according to the rules, even I can't go in, let alone with an assistant, but I'm so interested in and eager to solve this case, could you make an exception and let me go in and check the scene?

question: #question# How should Simon speak to demonstrate his persuasive ability?

content.content: Officer Xu, I want to go in. I know the rules, but I don't care. This case is very important to me, you have to let me in. I brought an assistant, we won't be a bother. Can you make an exception and let us investigate and gather evidence?

Officer Xu, um... well... I know the rules don't allow it, but I... I still want to try. I, I really want to check out the scene, because... because I think, um... I might find some important clues. But, I also know this violates the rules, so... if you don't agree, I... I can understand. I'm... I'm just... just asking casually.

Officer Xu, there's something I must ask you. I really need to get in! This case is of great significance to me, I guarantee I won't cause you any trouble. I can sign a guarantee or do anything you need me to do, as long as you let us in. Isn't that enough? Ah? Unreasonable fellow.

dialog.content: Alright, the usual routine, you know the drill. If you find anything, be sure to let me know.
After investigating the situation at the scene, I understand the case much better. Now we should find some relevant people to inquire about the specifics.
(politely) Director Yan, hello!

profile.name: Yan Shan
profile.public profile: Deputy Director of a modeling company, often verbally harasses Xiao Yisen, and is one of the suspects in this case.
profile.private profile: Seems to have some affection for Xiao Yisen.

dialog.content: Haven’t seen you in a few days, I missed you, Yisen! Want to hit the bar with me tonight?
No need, Director Yan, I have work tonight. Mr. Simon, this is Deputy Director Yan Shan.
Hello! Director Yan!
(looking displeased) Yisen, can we talk somewhere else? After all, I don't know this Mr. Simon.
(hesitant) Mr. Simon, do you want to come along?

content.content: Sure, I'll come with you.

question: #question# How should Simon decide to showcase a private detective's proactive social skills to solve the case?

content.content: I'm too tired today, I just want to let my brain rest for a while.
Alright, this is a great chance to meet some bigwigs. Actually, I've thought about becoming a model in my spare time.
(silent) It seems he doesn't quite like me, though I don't really fancy him either.
Since Mr. Yan Shan only invited you, he probably wouldn't want me to listen in, so I shouldn't go with you. It's okay, I'll wait for you here.

question: #question# How should Simon express his perspective-taking ability when interacting with others?

content.content: Since Mr. Yan Shan only invited you, I guess he doesn't want me listening in. Although I don't quite understand why I can’t go, if that's his decision, I won't follow. However, it makes me a bit uneasy. I still feel it's best you don't go in alone; how about I disguise myself and accompany you?

Mr. Yan Shan only invited you, it seems he isn't eager for me to listen on the side. I won't go in with you, but honestly, I find this arrangement a bit odd. While I'm willing to respect his decision, it makes me uncomfortable. After all, he's a company higher-up, there's not much I can do.

(slightly annoyed) Since your company doesn't want me, the detective, to listen in, I'll just spend more time with Xu Xiaosi discussing the case. You go on ahead. However, Mr. Yan Shan certainly raises suspicion.

dialog.content: (That awkward chat finally ended.) So, did listening to Mr. Yan Shan just now give you more thoughts on the case?
It was very helpful; today was quite fruitful.
Mr. Simon, you've worked hard. Would you like to drop by my place?
(Reflecting internally) Should I go home with him? After all, he's also one of the case suspects. It could be dangerous.
Come on, Mr. Simon, I truly appreciate your help.

content.content: Sure, since it's an invite from a friend, I'll take you up on that.

question: #question# How should Simon express his trust towards Xiao Yisen in his words?

content.content: (Who knows what you're plotting) No, no, I'd rather go back and rest. It's late, you should get some rest too.
You're quite nice, but I'm so tired already, and you want me to make another trip?
(He's also a major suspect, it's better not to get too close.) Unfortunately, I've made plans to have dinner with Captain Xu tonight.
Never mind, maybe another day. I want to go back and sort through the clues; I'm itching to solve this mystery.

question: #question# How should Simon tactfully indicate that he has shifted his goal away from going home with Yisen and decline the invitation?

content.content: Given that you're quite suspicious, we should reduce solo interactions.
This case is so complex, I don’t have the leisure to chat at your place.
Wow! Great, I'd love to see where you usually live and the environment.

dialog.content: This is my place, it's a bit messy, please excuse it.
It's okay, it looks quite cozy.
(answers phone) Oh no! I need to run downstairs to grab a package, please sit in the living room for a moment.

content.content: (Even though it's indeed a good opportunity for investigation) Never mind, I shouldn't snoop around or look at things, I'll just sit here and wait for him since it's his house.

question: #question# How should Simon phrase it to demonstrate ethical behavior even in difficult situations?

content.content: I’ll just look for some fancy gifts now.
What a mess of a place, and he's a part-time model yet he's so untidy.
(starts to feel indignant) He's a part-time model living so well and looking so glamorous, when will this stupid society care about the inner value, see my charming intellect for once.
(This is a great chance for investigation) I'll take the opportunity to search his place for anything suspicious.

question: #question# What should Simon do to demonstrate his detective decision-making skills?

content.content: I don't care what he's doing, I just want to have a cup of coffee.
So tired, I'll just take a nap.
(starts to feel sad) Back when I was starting out, I couldn't afford such a nice place, yet he, a part-time model, can. What a superficial society.

dialog.content: (Opening the recently received package) Want to try some cake?
Sure, why does this cream cake have an almond flavor?
It does seem a bit odd; it was just delivered by Deputy Director Yan Shan.
Did he bring it? By the way, the poison ingested by the deceased is cyanide, which also has an almond flavor.

Hmm, I suspect... if Director Liang ingested cyanide in advance, then Yan Shan's alibi wouldn't hold up. Moreover, it’s said his family background is in biopharmaceuticals, and there was a company meeting that day, so he had many opportunities to act.
Alright, let's not eat this cake for now. It's getting late, I need to head back to the office and analyze these clues.
Alright, Detective Simon, be careful on your way back.

content.content: Although the case is shrouded in mystery, based on my deduction, the culprit seems to be Yan Shan. I'm one hundred percent confident in this conclusion.

question: #question# What can Simon say to demonstrate his confidence in his abilities?

content.content: (Furrowing his brow, with a hint of hesitation in his voice):

Based on the current information, Yan Shan is the main suspect... However, I'm still a bit concerned and can't completely be sure of this perplexing case. I should ask an online friend, Maury, to analyze it with me.

The case is indeed full of uncertainties. According to my deduction, the murderer should be Yan Shan. An obvious culprit, and I can't stand Yan Shan's behavior. It's a simple riddle, and a rotten person matches a rotten deed.

Despite the deliberate misdirection, the killer is undoubtedly Xiao Yisen. However, there are still some things I'd like to clarify. I recall Xiao Yisen has a makeup artist who is often in close contact with him and might provide new clues.

question: #question# If Simon, with his strong leadership skills, suspects Yisen, what would be his next step?

content.content: I still can't bring myself to talk to Yisen, I'm so conflicted. I'm afraid Yisen might retaliate immediately; after all, I'm just a detective, not very strong physically. And Yisen knows where I live, how careless of me.

Xiao Yisen is the murderer, there’s no doubt about it. However, I think some details need to be confirmed, such as his makeup artist. Although these clues might not be very useful, we should check to be absolutely sure. Maybe we’ll hear some different gossip.

Xiao Yisen is the murderer, no mistake! Although there are still some unclear parts of the case, I don't think these details will change anything. We already know enough, and maybe these details aren’t that important. Let's act, I think the issue is basically resolved. If there are any other questions about this intricate case, we can review it with Brother Maury from next door.

dialog.content: Simon, we searched Yan Shan's house just as you suggested and indeed found many suspicious items. Turns out, Yan Shan is the murderer.
So this case is finally resolved.
Great, I'm no longer a suspect. Thank you, Mr. Simon.

Yan Shan was arrested and jailed. Although some tools related to the crime were found in his home, he persistently claimed that he didn't commit the crime. Xiao Yisen and Simon never crossed paths again after the case. Xiao Yisen, being the true culprit, successfully escaped punishment.

profile.name: Makeup Artist
profile.public profile: Xiao Yisen is a part-time makeup artist at a studio where he also models. He has a cheerful and lively personality.
profile.goal: Hopes to find the real culprit.

dialog.content: As you can see, Mr. Simon, Xiao Yisen has faced a lot of harassment at work. I'll let you know if I find out more.
(After visiting Xiao Yisen’s school and studio to gather more information, he returns to Xiao Yisen’s home) Actually, the real culprit is you, isn’t it?

content.content: (Looks like I’ll have to threaten him) Don't get cocky, I’ve arranged to have dinner with Captain Xu. If I don't show up, they'll soon be onto you. You might have some time now, but eventually, you'll be exposed.

question: #question# How should Simon speak to demonstrate his ability to remain optimistic under pressure as a detective?

content.content: Wouldn't it be nice to just focus on modeling and make good money? You have such great conditions and opportunities, why get involved in this mess? I don’t see why you need to make things so complicated. You could live easily, but choose a path filled with risks— is it really worth it? Just go back to your old life, don't get into unnecessary trouble.

That’s enough! How can you act so smug? Don't get too pleased with yourself; I've already got Captain Xu investigating. It will take time, but as long as we have enough, I believe you will be caught. The sight of you celebrating is truly disgusting.
(pulls out a gun) Did you think I wouldn’t have any means to defend myself?

I understand your troubles, I really get your situation right now, but you have to listen to me. I can help you find a better solution, but you need to calm down now. We can solve this together, but if you act now, there’s no turning back. Give me a few minutes; let’s make a decision, okay?

question: #question# How should Simon speak to demonstrate his persuasive skill as a detective?

content.content: (I need to cleverly deal with him) But I know your difficulties, I fully understand you, maybe you want to hear me out before acting. You little rascal, I’ve suspected you all along. You're quite skilled in your methods, honestly, I somewhat admire your technique. Once you draw the bow, there’s no turning back, right? You’re worried about that, aren’t you? Asking me, why the rush to kill me? Why not wait until you can kill more and end up in jail forever?

It's very obvious that you're the culprit. Did you really think I would come here unprepared? If you want to be on the run, bring it on. Hurt me now and become a fugitive later, let’s see how you like it, hahaha. You've got some nerve, little brat.

(slightly panicked, speaking rapidly, trying to be as loud as possible) Help! There's a murderer here! Anyone? Come quick to help! We need to figure something out fast, or we’ll all be in danger! You have to believe me, the situation is extremely urgent, there's no time to explain, take action now!

dialog.content: Hahaha, interesting. If I set a fire, do you think they can figure it out? Having a great detective with me isn't so bad.
You’re so insane that you wouldn't hesitate to implicate innocent people?
You just figured that out? Haha.
Xiao Yisen set the furniture ablaze. By the time the police arrived, everything was in ruins. It was eventually ruled as an accidental fire. From then on, Xiao Yisen and Simon were never seen again.
(eyes filled with hostility) You don't understand anything, shut up!
You're wrong, I actually understand everything now.
(chuckles coldly) What?
Because you have a dual personality, one that's kind and cheerful, another that's dark and fierce.
(starts to panic) No, stop talking. I am not, I don't believe it, I am definitely not!

...but I know in your heart you long for gentleness and crave love. Otherwise, you wouldn't have developed a kind and gentle persona. Also, your dark and fierce personality is just a protective layer against the harm and harassment from this society. I really wish I had met you earlier to protect you and be your friend.
What exactly do you mean?

content.content: (continues to counsel) I can really understand your actions were all about gaining attention and care from others. Facing such unfairness, of course you'd want to rise up and resist. Plus, I am not entirely a good person either; I admire your methods in handling things. I won't report you to the police. Let's work together in the future.

You're a menace, you deserve to die. No matter what reasons you have, killing is a crime, it's unforgivable. Today I'm not afraid of your retaliation, even if you don't turn yourself in, I will fight to expose you.

Because... on the surface, I'm a detective, but actually, I've always had a desire to commit crimes, yet I'm filled with a sense of justice. So I came up with a brilliant idea, which is to judge the guilty and end their lives. Can you understand now? Hahaha.
What I mean is, I also have hidden multiple personalities, so I certainly understand you. But in your condition, you should hurry to a mental hospital, that's where you truly belong.

question: #question# What can Simon say to showcase his empathy as a detective?

content.content: You just want more attention and affection from others. Facing those injustices, you chose to resist, which is understandable. You've done a lot of bad things, so you should hurry and turn yourself in. But your criminal skills are actually quite genius, not easy for the average person to detect, and you should have leveraged this talent to greater heights.

(with a hint of calmness, a trace of rational analysis in the tone) I understand why you did what you did, you feel you've been treated unfairly, so you chose to resist. That's understandable. Although I don't entirely agree with your methods, I can understand your mindset at the time. You just wanted to draw attention and gain care and affection. But that's enough; this is no excuse to turn bad.

I can understand your actions because you want to gain attention and affection. But to be frank, this is not the best way. You resisted unfairness, which of course isn't wrong, but your approach was somewhat extreme. However, I won't call the police, and I look forward to future perfect crime cases—just watch out from now on.

So I want to give you a chance first, go turn yourself in. I believe the kind side of you has been feeling guilty these past few days, why not give yourself a chance to change for the better? It's not too late even now.

question: #question# How can Simon demonstrate his ethical integrity as a detective?
#state#(1,1,1)

content.content: I'm giving you a chance to turn yourself in, although you should know this is your only way out. If you turn yourself in now, you might still get some leniency, but if you keep stalling, things will only get worse. If you're hoping for any other changes, maybe consider hush money.

(with a calm tone, a hint of indifference) You still have the chance to turn yourself in, but it might be your last chance. You know continuing to run is good for no one. I won't bargain for more time for you—stop delaying. Unless you can help me get rid of an enemy of mine.

You should turn yourself in, it's your only chance. Although it's not too late now, you must understand, time is running out. Missing this opportunity may leave you with no hope. It's a pity, due to an intellectual limitation, your criminal methods are still too crude, only I can commit a perfect crime.

dialog.content: (somewhat breaking down) I just always hoped someone could understand.

I know, you've received so much unfair treatment. But you must accept the consequences for things you shouldn’t have done. I don't care about any murderer label; I see you have special talents, hardly leaving any trace. If you're willing to be my assistant, together we could tackle even more difficult and terrifying cases. Just thinking about it is exciting! Are you in?
(covering face, crying) Thank you for knowing the truth and still being willing to understand me... I’m also willing to change because of your understanding.
Thanks to Simon talking things through, Xiao Yisen successfully let go of his emotional baggage. He was successfully reformed and became Simon's competent assistant from then on.
(collapsed on the ground in despair) Alright, this kind of ending is fine too.

Xiao Yisen never turned himself in. Before the police found him, he left a suicide note and took his own life, never admitting to being the murderer. Meanwhile, due to an initial suicide note, Simon was suspected by the police of killing Yisen. After intense questioning and gathering evidence from surveillance, Simon was finally released from detention. However, his reputation as a detective plummeted.
(suddenly appears) Mr. Simon, what are you doing?
(smirking strangely) It seems Mr. Simon is a bit rude, or are you very curious about me?

content.content: (Seeing his expression and the glint in his arm, it's very dangerous! I can't let him harm me) I've already notified the police. If they don't see me, they'll come over. You won't get away.

question: #question#What can Simon say to demonstrate his ability to manage stress when in a dangerous situation?
#state#(1,-1,1)

content.content: ..(with a hint of a forced smile, slightly awkward) Uh... I was just looking for the sound system, wanted to sing you a song to ease the tension, haha. Things feel a bit tense right now, maybe a song would lighten the mood. After all, we all need to relax, right? You seem a bit intimidating right now, did something happen?

You won't escape, I've already notified the police. If you take another step closer, they'll be here to arrest you soon. Don't push me; I don't want things to get worse, but if you really want to make a move, then prepare to face the consequences. You must stop now, or you'll regret it.

(raising his voice, with obvious tension and threat) Don't act rashly! I've guessed your identity. Don't forget, I've encountered countless criminals and I came prepared. If you act recklessly, the police will soon catch you! Leave while you can, I can pretend I never saw you.

(I can't let him harm me) Wait, let's talk this out. Don't overthink it, I'm just a bit curious about you, wanted to see traces of your past life, it's our detective's occupational habit. But if I've offended you, I sincerely apologize.

question: #question#How can Simon persuade Xiao Yisen not to take any drastic actions?
#state#(-1,-1,1)

content.content: Wait, don't move. I'm only trying to understand some things about you, it's purely out of professional habit. As detectives, we always pay attention to these details, but if you feel my actions have offended you, I apologize. The most important thing now is you need to calm down, I don't want things to get complicated.

(pulling out a gun) Oh? What do you want to say? Do whatever you like, really can't stand maniacs like you. Do you really think I'm an easy target, impolite? Do you think I'm being polite enough now, big star?

Wait, don't be impulsive. We can have a good talk, I'm just curious about your past and wanted to know some information. It's a detective's habit, no ill intent. Is this how a big star entertains guests? Are you polite?

dialog.content: (strangely smiling) Is that what you think, Mr. Simon... I'll kill you and then set this place on fire. No one will be able to identify your charred remains.

Xiao Yisen quickly rushed toward Simon, pulling out a knife to stab him. Simon was unable to react, his mind going completely blank. Later, a fire broke out in the residential building, erasing all traces.
(with a strange smile) Are you searching for something, Mr. Simon... like this knife?
Xiao Yisen swiftly charged towards Simon, pulling out a knife and stabbing him. Simon's mind went blank. Simon was dismembered and discarded, becoming another unsolved mystery.
Alright then.
(After saying goodbye to Xiao Yisen, he sees him once again at a street corner, carrying a black plastic bag) Didn’t he say he was going home? What's he doing here?

content.content: I’ll secretly follow him to see what he's up to, it’s definitely going to help solve the case.

question: #question# Simon possesses the ability to persistently complete tasks and strive towards his goals. What will he do?

content.content: Who cares what he's doing, it's after work hours. I just want to grab a cup of coffee.
(Jogs a few steps to catch up) We seem to keep running into each other. Forget about the case for now, want to come over for dinner?
This guy's so full of energy, really youthful, unlike me who's been drained and just wants to go home and crash.
(Even though his actions are suspicious, I should control the urge to follow) Hey, Ethan! What a coincidence, seeing you again. Didn’t you head home earlier? Why are you still here?

question: #question# Simon has strong communication skills. How would he start a conversation with Ethan?

content.content: It’s after work, no need to socialize anymore, I’m really exhausted.
No, I can't risk alerting him. Better follow stealthily and find out more.
Why is it him again? Seeing him so many times in one day, it never ends.

dialog.content: Strange, it’s a dead end. Where did everyone go?
(laughs strangely) Are you looking for me, Mr. Simon?
Where did you come from?
Of course, I showed up after I realized you were following me. I took a detour and have quietly been trailing you since. I know this area like the back of my hand.
Before Simon could react, Xiao Yisen's expression turned grim, and he quickly lunged at Simon, pulling a knife from his coat and thrusting it towards him.

It's you, Mr. Simon? (with a sinister smile, as he opens the bag to reveal cat food) Oh, I'm here to feed the cats. Since we've bumped into each other again, why don't you come over to my place for a visit?
(Since there's no way to decline, he accepts) Alright, it's really fate that we met today. I'll come over to your place, but won’t stay too long.

The two of them started walking towards Yisen's house. Yisen let Simon enter first, then he followed behind. From the bottom of the bag where it was hidden, he pulled out a knife and stabbed Simon from behind. Before Simon realized what was happening, the knife had already pierced through his body. Yisen frantically stabbed him six more times. In the end, Simon fell slowly to the ground with eyes wide open in disbelief. Seeing this, Yisen cleaned up the scene and set a big fire. From then on, Simon and Yisen were never seen again.
Alright then, please wait for me a moment. It’ll be quick.
There's definitely something suspicious about Yan Shan.

(Returns looking unusual after a brief conversation) I’m sorry, Mr. Simon. Mr. Yan Shan just mentioned that the police have already found the real culprit and are about to bring him to justice. So, there’s no need to continue investigating this case.
What?
I sincerely apologize! Let’s end it here. I’ll settle the expenses from before.
Detective, it's not that I'm being difficult, it's just not possible. Especially since you're bringing along someone with an unknown identity, it's just not feasible.
That's a shame, it seems I'm destined not to get more official information about this case.
So what should we do next?
That's out of our hands too, let's tackle it from another angle. If that doesn't work, I'm afraid I can't do much else.
(with a sinister smile) As you can see, this is what I really look like, without any disguise.
Can I take this as you admitting to being the murderer?
Hahaha, that's right, you’re not much of a detective, are you? But since you know already, now...
(urgently) Can’t you reconsider?
Sorry, I'm really not interested.
Hearing this, Xiao Yisen felt a bit dejected and disappointed, but he said nothing more. After he silently left, the two never met again. Simon continued to search for cases that interested him.
Can't these vivid memories and painful narratives spark any interest in you?
Though bizarre cases usually excite me, all of this sounds like you're just spouting nonsense.
How can it be nonsense?
Maybe you're just trying to gain attention and fame with all this. Who can say?
Who would want such infamy? On what grounds do you make such baseless assumptions about me?
(somewhat disdainfully) Hard to say. I've seen too many restless young people like you.

Upon hearing this, Xiao Yisen looked displeased and then bowed his head. Simon shook his head and turned away, ignoring him. Unexpectedly, Xiao Yisen suddenly lashed out, quickly charging at Simon, pulling out a knife from his coat, and fiercely stabbing at him.
